info.name: BMC Remedy - Black
info.description: My style for BMC Remedy webapp
info.additionalInfo:
Thanks for Fidelich for his style that encouraged me to create my own.
https://userstyles.org/styles/132937/bmc-remedy-gold

It might only work for my version of Remedy and my company.

It creates a issue with some images not showing, buttons not having a gradient effect and some unselectable (the one you cannot select by mouse) text not showing.
It is due to setting global background color to black (I did it because I'm lazy) so it replace all "background" with black - most images as well. So the unselectable text is set to black by default, as is the background.
